Class AjaxController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.area.webserver.web.AjaxController

  • @RestController
public class AjaxController
extends java.lang.Object
    Class handling all of the AJAX request and their lives Each new entrypoint should be mapped to /api/... for better management
